examples.korean: The kidnapped children were all ransomed and returned home unharmed. 발음듣기 유괴된 아이들은 모두 몸값이 지불되어 무사히 집으로 돌아왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The kidnapped children were all ransomed and returned home unharmed. 발음

examples.korean: He escaped without a scratch. 발음듣기 그는 생채기 하나 없이 무사히 탈출했다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He escaped without a scratch. 발음

examples.korean: Let her come home safely! 발음듣기 부디 그녀가 무사히 집으로 돌아오기를! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let her come home safely! 발음

examples.korean: The child was found safe and well. 발음듣기 그 아이는 무사히 찾았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The child was found safe and well. 발음

examples.korean: They turned up safe and sound. 발음듣기 그들은 무사히 아무 탈 없는 모습으로 나타났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They turned up safe and sound. 발음
